text_block_list.text: Ah… e-excuse me! Sorry, comin' through! Oof…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Huh…? Teio, where'd you…? Ugh…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Oh, hey Nature. Aren't you supposed to be on br—
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: Sorry, but have you seen Teio anywhere?!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Teio-san? Oh, I think I saw her…
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: Teio! U-Um, I…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: …Wait, you changed already?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: It's cause the collar of that suit was sooo stuffy! It did make me look super cool, though.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: I showed off for the judges, and I gave it my all out there! Now I'm just waiting for the results.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: …Oh. Ah, yeah, of course! Yeah… I suppose you wouldn't want to dance anymore after that, huh.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Yeah, of course. Good work! Seriously, your dancing was so cool. Like, I was watching from the gallery up above, and…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: You were so cool that I couldn't stand watching you.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Nature…?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Argh, no! Don't be weird, Nature! Aha, sorry, Teio.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: I think McQueen is the date you deserve. She's your one and only rival, the center of everyone's gaze.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: That's really, truly how I feel.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: …But, y'know!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: It doesn't have to be this year! It doesn't even have to be next year!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Just, someday… will you dance with me, too?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: …Because I'm your rival and classmate, too.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Sounds good! Howzabout a dance right now?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Yeah, I know, sorry. For now we can just— huh? R-Right now? Like, now?!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Yup, right now!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: B-But you're in your tracksuit and I'm in my uniform! We don't have any Dorowa dresses…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: We can just go get changed again! And you can just grab a rental dress for today! C'mon, I'm sure they have one!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: How are your legs feeling? If you're hungry at all, I can go grab us some snacks from the table over there!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Thank you, Chiyono O-san, but I'm quite alright. …Oh, my.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Alright, let's dance, Nature!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Oh… w-wait! Just let me take one last deep breath real quick! I haven't practiced my steps at all!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: C'mon, I thought you made up your mind on this already! Plus, this is just a hunch, but…
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: No matter what kinda dance we do, I know you can keep up with me!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: …Okay, then while we're dancing, you have to look at me, too.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: 'Course I will! As your classmate and rival, I'm gonna put your skills to the test, 'kay?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: So you took a step forward too, I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …Ardan-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: No looking at other girls! I'm your date for tonight.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Oh! 
…Yes, you're quite right.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: And so, our special night drew to a close.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Heya, Chiyono O! You're real pumped up today.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Teio-san! Congratulations on your win the other day.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: You deserved Best Date. Seems like it was difficult to win against you two after all, what with our hasty preparation.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: You don't seem too down in the dumps to me, though?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
I got out all my anger and frustration that night. 
Besides…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: This just means I have to think even harder about how to win next time! There's no time to waste being all depressed!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ahaha! You really do hate to lose too, huh?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Chiyono O-san. It seems Yaeno Muteki-san has joined us today. Shall we begin with our partner running?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Sounds good! I won't lose to either of you! Not in race, nor in spirits!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: So, Teio-san, did you relay to her that message Maruzen-san gave you?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Ah! Ehehe, I totally forgot!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: I'll go let her know she's better of telling Chiyono O herself. "I'm not gonna lose," that is!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
